title: agentF
author: agentF
content: Hey Guys,While I stated that PNNV.com is a community-based project, it still is. I want to add a banner to help me cover some of the expenses. My expenses are high with zero income. So I was thinking of selling banner space at the header or at the button (we'll figure it out together)So I got 24K users per month (see the attached google analytics stats) 100% are crypto dedicated mainly from Europe.The bid starts from 1000$ for two weeks with 50$ increment.You can either pay with BTC OR USDT (ERC 20).

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: is it possible to purchase a banner space from you in the near future?and how big are these banners then?

comments.author: agentF
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on December 25, 2022, 08:21:44 AMis it possible to purchase a banner space from you in the near future?and how big are these banners then?Yes, we can put something in the header or at the bottom.mosty likely, i designÂ  a special adjustment for each company i work with.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: agentF on December 23, 2022, 03:49:43 PMNo need anymore. when will the new banner ad be online on your site, so that i can get a feeling of how the whole thing could/will look then?
